abstract: Stocks continue to climb in broad rally that began with reassurance from Federal Reserve that it would slow interest rate growth.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the cruise operator Carnival rose 3.5 percent after the company reported results that were better than analysts were expecting.

headline.main: Wall St. Is Higher, Led by Banking and Tech
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise in a Wide-Ranging Rally

snippet: Shares of the cruise operator Carnival rose 3.5 percent after the company reported results that were better than analysts were expecting.
